sentences.en: Acceptance isit is commonly consummate and the behavior means below.
sentences.cn: 承诺制,一般是至上而下的行为方式.

sentences.en: Combining with its practice, this article draws lessons from the experiences of Japanese examinational committee, and brings out some suggestions to consummate the system.
sentences.cn: 本文结合人民监督员制度运行的实践，借鉴日本检察审查会制度的经验，就完善人民监督员制度提出构想。

sentences.en: Factory with consummate skill, good reputation, good service, won the praise and trust of our customers, business across the country.
sentences.cn: 本厂以精湛的技艺、良好的信誉、周到的服务，深得广大客户的好评和信赖，业务遍布全国各地。 %。

sentences.en: He acted the part with consummate skill.
sentences.cn: 他以精湛的演技饰演了这一角色。

sentences.en: He combined consummate shrewdness with the disposition superficially to fraternize.
sentences.cn: 他把高度的精明和温和敦厚的外表结合了起来.

sentences.en: He combined consummate shrewdness with the disposition.
sentences.cn: 他把高度的精明和这个性格结合了起来.

sentences.en: He won the race with consummate ease.
sentences.cn: 他不费吹灰之力就赢了赛跑.

sentences.en: His wife divorced him for failing to consummate their marriage.
sentences.cn: 他的妻子因为他未能完婚而跟他离婚了。

sentences.en: In his work he was a consummate professional.
sentences.cn: 他的作品表现出精美绝伦的专业修养.

sentences.en: Scarlett exercised the same charms as Melanie but with a studied artistry and consummate skill.
sentences.cn: 思嘉也像媚兰那样发挥自己魅力的作用,但是她还使用了一种很有修养的功夫和高度的技巧.

sentences.en: She has not merely art, consummate art instinct, in her, but she has personality also.
sentences.cn: 她不光有艺术天赋, 有完美的艺术本能, 而且她还很有个性.
她是个技艺非凡的表演者。

sentences.en: She was really a consummate piece of painting.
sentences.cn: 她实在是一幅精美绝伦的画.

sentences.en: The intimacy between these two was by this time consummate.
sentences.cn: 他们两人之间的亲密情谊此刻已达到高峰.

sentences.en: The restored jade burial suit fully reveals the consummate skill of the labouring people of ancient China.
sentences.cn: 复原后的金缕玉衣充分显示出中国古代劳动人民的精湛工艺.

sentences.en: The whole of that family are the most solemnly conceited and consummate blockheads!
sentences.cn: 他们那一家子都是极其自高自大的不折不扣的傻瓜!

sentences.en: This landscape painting is a consummate work of art.
Those familiar with Sanders call him a consummate politician.
sentences.cn: 那些熟悉桑德斯的人都称他为手段高明的政治家。

words.tran_cn: 保护消费者利益运动；用户至上主义
圆满成功；完成；成就；达到极点

trans.tran_cn: 完美的，至上的，圆满的，无比的

trans.tran_en: to make something complete, especially an agreement
